mapper.delete: DELETE FROM teaching_material WHERE for_chapter = (SELECT id FROM chapter WHERE id = #{chapterId})
mapper.select: SELECT ci.id AS courseInstId, c.name, c.course_type AS courseType, c.course_cate AS courseCate, c.course_for AS courseFor, c.credit, c.grade_level AS gradeLevel, c.school_id AS schoolId, sc.name AS schoolName, f.url AS coursePic, ci.year, ci.term_part AS termPart, ci.total_class_hour AS totalClassHour FROM course_inst ci JOIN course c ON ci.course_id = c.id JOIN teach t ON c.id = t.course_id JOIN school sc ON sc.id = c.school_id JOIN file f ON f.id = c.course_pic WHERE t.teacher_id = #{teacherId} AND ci.year = #{year} AND ci.term_part = #{termPart}
